comments:
I have tested the same set of files on both Windows and Linux (GUI and command line).  The scenario fails on Linux command line only.  This is the error message in wsgen.txt (I also double check that ScenarioType is set in the properties file):

Buildfile: wsgen.xml
     [echo] pulling in property files
     [echo] calling the web services generation ant task: wsgen

main:
    [wsgen] Plug-in org.eclipse.jst.ws.consumption.ui was unable to load class org.eclipse.jst.ws.internal.consumption.ui.ant.AntClientRootCommandFragment.
    [wsgen] Cannot determine scenario type.  Please ensure ScenarioType Ant property is set.
BUILD SUCCESSFUL

BUILD SUCCESSFUL
Total time: 0 seconds

There are several plugin activation/classloading issues in the .log file also (complete file available upon requested), for example:

Hi Andrew,

Thanks for your information, enabling the osgi.ws=gtk in config.ini fixes the problem.

Regards,

Kelvin
This is probably not a bug in WTP.
